definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: come or go down, descend (NH id.; MI:32 [[וארד]] and [[רד]]; As. arâdu, Dl:HWB 240; Ar. warada come to, arrive at, also descend; Eth. warada: descend; Sab. [[ורד]] and [[הורד]] id., DHM in MV)—

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: come or go down: from ([[מִן]]) a mountain Ex 19:14, Ex 32:1, Ex 32:15 (all E), Ex 34:29, Ex 34:29 (JE), De 9:15, De 10:5, Nu 20:28 (P) +; abs. Ex 19:21, Ex 19:24 (J), v:Ex 19:25 (J; c. [[אֶל]] pers.); from the air, of birds, sq. [[עַל]] Ge 15:11 (JE).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: go down (usu. from mountain or hill-country into plain), to battle, abs. Ju Jdg 5:14; sq. [[לָעֵמֶק]] Ju Jdg 1:34; sq. [[לַשְּׁעָרִים]] Ju Jdg 5:11; sq. [[אֶל]] v:Jdg 5:10, v:Jdg 5:11, cf. 1Sa 17:8 (sq. [[אֶל]] pers.); sq. [[לִקְרַאת]] Ju Jdg 7:24; sq. [[אַחֲרֵי]] pers. 1Sa 14:36; sq. [[ב]] loc. Ju Jdg 7:9; [[בַּמִּלְחָמָה יֵרֵד וְנִסְפָּה]] 1Sa 26:10, cf. 1Sa 29:4, 1Sa 30:24; of single combat, [[וַיַּרֶד אֵלָיו בַּשָָּׁבֶט]] 2Sa 23:21 = 1Ch 11:23.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: go down to (acc.) threshing-floor, Ru 3:3, Ru 3:5; (from David's palace) to Uriah's house ([[אֶל]]) 2Sa 11:9, 2Sa 11:10, 2Sa 11:10, 2Sa 11:13; from temple to (acc.) king's house Je 36:12 (+ [[עַל־לִשְׁכַּת הַסּׂפֵר]]); [[רֵד בֵּית־מֶלֶךְ]] [[יְהוּדָח]] Je 22:1, etc.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: go down (abs.) from Palestine to Egypt Ge 42:3 (E), v:Ge 42:38 (J) + 6 t. JE; † sq. [[אֵלַי]] Ge 45:9 (E); sq. [[מִעְרַ֫יְמָה]] Ge 46:3, Ge 46:4 (E), Ge 12:10, Ge 26:2 (both J), Nu 20:15 (JE); sq. [[מִחְרֵיִם]] Jos 24:4 (E), Ge 43:15 (J), Is 30:2, Is 31:1, Is 52:4; sq. [[שָׁמָּה]] Ge 42:2 (E) †; so to Philistine cities Ju Jdg 14:19, Jdg 16:31, 1Sa 13:20, Am 6:2.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: from Jerusalem, abs. Ju Jdg 1:9, 1Ki 1:25, Ne 6:3, 2Ch 20:16 (to battle); to Jezreel 2Ki 8:21 = 2Ki 9:26 = 2Ch 22:6; to Samaria 1Ki 22:2 = 2Ch 18:2; (to Gihon) 1Sa 1:38, etc. †

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: from altar [[ירד מֵעֲשׂוֹת הַחַטָּאת]] Le 9:22 (P); from chariot, c. [[מֵעַל]] Ju Jdg 4:15; from ass, c. [[מֵעַל]] 1Sa 25:23; from throne, c. [[מֵעַל]] Ez Eze 26:16, abs. Is 47:1, cf. [[רְדִי מִכָּבוֹד]] Je 48:18; from ships, c. [[מִן]] Ez Eze 27:29; from bed, c. [[מִן]] 2Ki 1:4, 2Ki 1:6, 2Ki 1:16 (all opp. [[עלה]]). †

definitions.title: g.
definitions.body: go down [[הָעַ֫יְנׇה]] Ge 24:16, Ge 24:45 (J); sq. [[לִרְחׂץ עַל הַיְאׂר]] Ex 2:5 (E), cf. (abs.) 2Ki 5:14; sq. acc. [[הַסֶּלַע]] 1Sa 23:25; [[יוֹרְדֵי הַיׇּם]] Is 42:10; [[יוֹרְדֵי הַיׇּם בָּאֳנִיּוֹת]] Ps 107:23; abs. (into pit or well) 2Sa 23:30 = 1Ch 11:22, sq. [[שָׁם]] (i.e. [[בְּאֵר]]) 2Sa 17:18.—[[וְיׇרַדְתִּי]] Ju Jdg 11:37, rd. [[וְרַדְתִּי]] (√ [[רוד]], wander about), RS in Bla. †

definitions.title: h.
definitions.body: = sink, in water [[יָֽרְדוּ בִמְחוֹלוֹת]] [[כְּמוֹ־אָָבֶן]] Ex 15:5 (song in E); [[לְקִחְבֵי הָרַים יׇרַדְתִּי]] Jon 2:7; more gen., opp. rising, [[יַעֲלוּ הָרִים יֵֽרְדוּ]] [[בְקָעוֹת]] Ps 104:8 mountains rise, valleys sink; [[יַעֲלוּ שָׁמַיִם יֵרְדוּ תְהוֹמוֹת]] Ps 107:26.

definitions.title: j.
definitions.body: fig. [[יׁרֵד בַּבֶָּכִי]] Is 15:3 going down (dissolving) in tears (‖[[יְיֵלֵיל]]; cf.

definitions.title: k.
definitions.body: = be prostrated, abs., of horses and riders Hag 2:22, cf. Is 34:7, perh. also Je 48:15, Je 50:27 (+ [[לַטָָּבַח]]); forest Is 32:19, Zec 11:2; city De 20:20, La 1:9; wall De 28:52; nation [[תֵּרֵד מַ֫טָּה]] [[מָָטָּה]] De 28:43 (opp. [[עלה]]); [[מַצֵּבוֹת]] Ez Eze 26:11 + [[לָאָרֶץ]] (where Co [[ויחרדו]]). †

of divine manifestations: descend, of ´[[י]] in theoph. [=[[על ההר]]][[יׇרַד עָלָיו]] [[בָּאֵשׁ]] ´[[י]] Ex 19:11, Ex 19:18 (E), v:Ex 19:20 (J; [[אֶל־ראׁשׁ הָהָר]]), cf. Ne 9:13; [[חְבָאוֹת לִחְבּאׁ עַל־הַר־חִיּוֹן]] ´[[יֵרֵד י]] Is 31:4; abs. Ge 11:5, Ge 11:7, Ge 18:21, Ex 3:8 (all J), Nu 11:17 (JE), 2Sa 22:10 = Ps 18:10 (cf. Ps 144:5), Mic 1:3, Is 63:19, Is 64:2; [[וַיֵּרֶד]] [[בֶּעָנׇן]] ´[[י]] Ex 34:5, Nu 11:25, cf. Nu 12:5 (all JE); of pillar of cloud Ex 33:9 (JE); [[מִי עָלָה־שָׁמַיִם וַיֵּ״ַרד]] Pr 30:4; of angels on [[סֻלָּם]]; [[עׂלִים וְיׁרְדִים בּוֹ]] Ge 28:12 (E).
of inanimate things:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: hail c. [[עַל]] pers. Ex 9:19 (J); dew c. [[עַל]] loc. Nu 11:9 (JE), Ps 133:3; rain (as [[אָבָק]] and [[עָפָר]]), sq. [[מִן הַשָּׁמַיִם]] + [[על]] pers. De 28:24, so in sim. of future king [[יֵרֵד כְּמָטָר עַל־גֵּז]] Ps 72:6; of [[גֶּשֶׁם]] and [[שֶׁלֶג]], c. [[מִן הַשָּׁמַיִם]] Is 55:10; manna (c. [[עַל]] loc.) Nu 11:9 (JE); fire from ([[מִן]]) heaven 2Ki 1:10, 2Ki 1:10, 2Ki 1:12, 2Ki 1:12, 2Ki 1:14, 2Ch 7:1, abs. 2Ch 7:3.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: waters, flowing down [[הַנַּחַל הַיּׁרֵד מִן־הָהָר]] De 9:21, cf. Jos 3:13 (sq. [[מִלְמָָעָלָה]]), v:Jos 3:16; sq. [[עַל־יַם הָעֲרָבָה]] v:Jos 3:16; [[עַל־הָעֲרָבָה]] Ez Eze 47:8; sq. [[מִן]] Eze 47:1.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: tears, [[פַּלְגֵי־מַיִם]] [[יָֽרְדוּ עֵינׇ֑י]] Ps 119:36, and so La 3:48; also [[עֵינִי יׁרְדָה]] [[מַיִם]] La 1:16, and so Je 9:17, Je 13:17, Je 14:17 (cf. also Is 15:3,

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: of oil descending upon ([[על]]) beard, etc. Ps 133:2, Ps 133:2.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: of shadow on dial 2Ki 20:11 = Is 38:8, Is 38:8.

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: of boundary going down (from or to a place) Jos 16:3 (JE), elsewhere P, Nu 34:11, Nu 34:11, Nu 34:12, Jos 15:10, Jos 16:7, Jos 17:9, Jos 18:13, Jos 18:16.

definitions.title: g.
definitions.body: come down, abs. of headdresses, in sign of humiliation Je 13:18.

definitions.title: h.
definitions.body: pride of power Ez Eze 30:6.

definitions.title: i.
definitions.body: of calamity ´[[מֵאֵת י]] Mic 1:12; [[עַל־דְקְדוֹ חֲמָסוֹ יֵרֵד]] Ps 7:17; of sword descending on ([[על]]) Edom Is 34:5.

definitions.title: j.
definitions.body: fig. of words of talebearer; [[יׇרְֽדוּ חַדְרֵי־בָָּטֶן]] Pr 18:8 = Pr 26:22.—Vid. also supr.

definitions.title: 1 k.
Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[הוֹרִד]] 2Ki 16:17; [[וְהוֹרִיד]] consec. Am 3:11 (We [[וְהוּרַד]]); 2 ms. [[וְהוֹרַדְתָּ֫]] 1Ki 2:9; 2 fs. sf. [[הוֹרַדְתֵּנִי]] Jos 2:18 (v. Baer:n. and Kö:i. 412); [[הוֹרִידוּ]] 1Sa 6:15, La 2:10 etc.; Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיּוֹרֶד]] Ju Jdg 7:5 + 5 t. (+ 1Ki 6:32 Klo, who rds. [[וַיּׂרֶד]] for [[וַיָּרֶד]], v. [[רדד]]); sf. [[יוֹרִידֵנִי]] Ob:Ob 3; [[יוֹרִדֵהוּ]] 1Sa 30:16, 1Ki 17:23; [[וַיּׁרִדֵם]] 1Ki 18:40; 2 ms. [[וְלאׁ תּוֹרֵד]] 1Ki 2:6; sf. [[תוֹרִדֵנִי]]([[הֲ]]) 1Sa 30:15, [[תּוֹרִדֵם]] Ps 55:24 etc.; Imv. ms. [[הִוֹרֵד]] Ex 33:5 + 2 t.; sf. [[הוֹרִדֵהוּ]] Ez Eze 32:18; [[הוֹרִידֵמוֹ]] Ps 59:12; fs. [[הוֹרִידִי]] La 2:18; mpl. [[הוֹרִידוּ]] Ge 43:7, Ge 43:11; sf. [[הוֹרִדֻהוּ]] Ge 44:21; Inf. cstr. [[לְהוֹרִיד]] Ge 37:25; sf. [[הוֹרִדִי]] Ez Eze 31:16; Pt. [[מוֹרִיד]] 1Sa 2:6; [[מׂרִיד]] 2Sa 22:48; —cause to come or go down:

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: bring down (to Egypt), c. acc. pers. + [[שָׁ֫מָּה]] Ge 39:1 (J); + [[הֵ֫נׇּה]] Ge 45:13 (E); + [[אֵלַי]] Ge 44:21; abs. Ge 43:7; c. acc. rei Ge 43:11; + [[מִחְרַ֫יְמָה]] Ge 37:25; abs. Ge 43:22 (all J); from Canaan to desert De 1:25 (sq. [[אֵלֵינוּ]]); to ([[אֶל]]) Amalekites 1Sa 30:15, 1Sa 30:15; abs. v:1Sa 30:16; bring down (obj. pers. Vel rei) [[אָל־הַמַּיִם]] Ju Jdg 7:4, Jdg 7:5; [[אֶל־נַ֫חַל]] De 21:4, 1Ki 18:40; [[יׇ֫מָּה]] 1Ki 5:23; to Gaza ([[עַזׇּ֫תָה]]) Ju Jdg 16:21; from Jerusalem to Gihon, c. [[עַל]] (Qr [[אֶל]]) 1Ki 1:33; to valley of Jehosh. ([[אֶל]]) Joe 4:2; from ([[מִן]]) temple (to king's house) 2Ki 11:19 = 2Ch 23:20; from ([[מֵעַל]]) altar 1Ki 1:53; from ([[מִן]]) upper chamber, sq. [[הַבַּ֫יְתָה]] 1Ki 17:23; from ([[מִן]]) the heavens Am 9:2; Edom, from ([[מִן]]) nest in rocks Je 49:16, Ob:Ob 4; cf. of Isr. [[כְּעוֹף הַשָּׁמַיִם]] Ho 7:12; c. acc. of limit ([[אֶרֶץ]]) Ob:Ob 3; bring down (from Babylon) into ([[בְּ]]) ships Is 43:14 (v. VB).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: send down rain ([[הַגֶּשֶׁם]]) Ez Eze 34:26, cf. Joe 2:23; = cause to flow down, obj. spittle, [[וַיּוֹרֶד רִירוֹ אֶל־זְקָנוֹ]] 1Sa 21:14; tears [[הוֹרִידִי כַנַּחל דִּמְעָה]] La 2:18; water-streams [[וַיּוֹרֶד כַּנְּהָרוֹת מָָיִם]] Ps 78:16.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: = lay prostrate, prostrate [[הוֹרִיד מִמֵח עֻזֵּח]] Am 3:11 (where however We rds. [[וְהוּרַד]]), cf. Pr 21:22; [[וְאוֹרִיד כַּאבִּיר יוֹשְׁבִים]] Is 10:13; of God's casting down peoples Ps 56:8, Is 63:6 (sq. [[לָאָרֶץ]]); [[מוֹרִיד עַמִּים תַּחְתֵּנוּ]] 2Sa 22:48 ([[וַּיַּדְבֵּר]] in ‖ Ps 18:48); so perhaps Babylonians, like lambs, [[לִטְבַוֹחַ]] Je 51:40; so Ps 59:12 (si vera l.; SyrVer [[וַהֲנִידֵמוֹ]] make them vagabonds, v. Lag:Proph. Chald. (1872), xlviii. VB Hup Now Che Bae Dr:2Sa 15:20).

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: bring down to She’ôl :[[מֵמִית וּמְחַיֶּ֑ה מוֹרִיד שְׁאוֹל וַיׇּ֑עַל]] ´[[י]] 1Sa 2:6; sq. [[ל]]([[וֹ]])[[שְׁא]] also 1Ki 2:6, 1Ki 2:9; sq. [[שְׁא֫וֹלָה]] (obj. grey hair) Ge 42:38, Ge 44:29, Ge 44:31 (all J); cf. Ez 26:30, Eze 31:16, Eze 32:18; sq. [[לִבְאֵר שַׁחַת]] Ps 55:24; [[לַשַּׁחַת]] Ez Eze 28:8.

take down (from cart) 1Sa 6:15; the sea from upon ([[מֵעַל]]) the brazen oxen 2Ki 16:17; corpse from ([[מִן]]) tree Jos 8:29, and ([[מֵעַל]]) Jos 10:27 (both JE); the [[מִשְׁכָּן]] Nu 1:51 (P); the [[פָּרׂכֶת]] Nu 4:5 (P); take off ornaments [[מֵעָלֶיְ]] Ex 33:5 (JE).

let down [[וַתּׂ֫רֶד]] [[כַּדָּהּ עַל־יׇדָהּ]] Ge 24:18, so, with [[מֵעָלֶיהָ]] v:Ge 24:46, to give one a drink; [[וַיּוֹרִדוּ אִישׁ אֶת־אַמְתַּחְתוֹ אָָרְחָה]] Ge 44:11 (all J); obj. pers. Jos 2:18, [[בַּחֶבֶל בְּעַד הַחַלּוֹן]] v:Jos 2:15 (both JE); [[בְּעַד הַחַלּוֹן]] 1Sa 19:12; cf. also [[הוֹרִידוּ]] [[לָאָרֶץ ראׁשָׁן בְּתוּלֽת יְרוּשָׁלִַם]] La 2:10 the virgins of Jerusalem have bowed down their heads to the ground.

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[הוּרַד]] Ge 39:1 + 2 t. + 1Sa 30:34 Kt (Qr

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt.); [[וְהוּרַד]] consec. Zec 10:11; 2 ms. [[וְהוּרַדְתָּ֫]] Ez Eze 31:18; Impf. 2 ms. [[תּוּרַד]] Is 14:15; —

be brought down [[מִחְרַ֫יְמָה]] Ge 39:1 (J); [[בַּמִּלְחָטָה]] 1Sa 30:24 Kt (v. supr.); to She’ôl [[הוּרַד שְׁאוֹל גְּאוֹ□ֶנְ]] Is 14:11 (of king of Babylon); [[אֶל־שְׁאוֹל תּוּרַד]] [[אֶל־יַרְכְּתֵי־בוֹר]] v:Is 14:15; [[וְהוּרַדְתָּ֫ אֶל־אֶרֶץ תַּחְתִּית]] Ez Eze 31:18; [[וְהוּרַד גְּאוֹן אַשּׁוּר]] Zec 10:11.—In Am 3:11 We rds. [[וְהוּרַד ממך]] (v.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: supr.)
be taken down, of the [[מִשְׁכָּן]] Nu 10:17 (P).
